content_parts.content:
When a sales order is confirmed, you have the option to generate a proforma invoice before shipping. The proforma includes an expiry date. You can track proformas on a tab that displays after at least one is generated.

After generating the proforma PDF, you can download and send the file to your customer, so they have a preview of the expected billing.

content_parts.title: Unable to repost a stock count, adjustment or stock issue after adding dimensions

content_parts.content: Stock count, stock adjustment and stock issue documents can be reposted after adding the dimensions on the Notification history page when the status of these documents is Not recorded.

content_parts.title: With Authorisation access control and security options enabled, not possible to generate journal entries

content_parts.content: Enable the Authorisation access control to select the new permission to be able to generate journal entries.

content_parts.title: Purchase requisition: Limited supplier records available for selection

content_parts.content: The supplier selection list on the line panel of a purchase requisition line displays more records in the lookup.

content_parts.title: Update option not available for bill of material import

content_parts.content: You can perform an update using the bill of material import template.

content_parts.title: Non-absorbed variance option for purchasing documents

content_parts.content: On the Company page, you can determine whether journal entry lines are generated for non-absorbed amounts when posting a landed cost purchase invoice, a regular purchase invoice or a purchase credit note. When enabled, a stock journal is generated for the amounts that cannot be absorbed into the item's unit cost.

content_parts.title: Tax solutions based on a country not a legislation

content_parts.content: You can define a tax solution based on a selected country instead of a legislation. If your legislation is not included, you can set up a tax solution to determine and calculate taxes based on a selected country.

content_parts.title: Error when editing an inventory item with bin tracking active in Sage Intacct

content_parts.content:
On the Sage Intacct Mapping page, within the item object, the following properties are no longer associated with a Sage DMO property:
- Cost Method
- Lot Category Key
- Enable Serial Number
- Enable Lot Category
- Enable Expiration
- Enable Bins

This ensures that the item integration status no longer displays an error and maintains the accuracy of the integration status.
